XVR302-08U3

Uniview offers a diverse range of XVR models tailored to meet the requirements of different scenarios, whether it's for project-based needs or home use. You can easily find a product that satisfies you, ensuring both project and personal satisfaction.

Digital Video Recorder

Versatility in Resolution

Experience superior image quality across a diverse range of resolutions, from 2MP to 4K, ensuring exceptional visuals through our XVR product line..

Contact sales to learn more

Support H.265/H.264 video formats

Support audio over coaxial cable(only for TVI cameras)

Support analog camera upgrade over coaxial cable

Analog Video Input

16-ch, BNC

IP Video Input

2-ch(only IP up to 18ch), each channel up to 8MP

Supported Analog Camera Types

Support AHD input: 1080P@30fps 720P@30fps | Support TVI input: 1080P@30fps 720P@30fps | Support CVI input: 1080P@30fps 720P@30fps.

Audio Compression

G.711U.

VGA Output

1920x1080p/60Hz, 1920x1080p/50Hz, 1600x1200/60Hz, 1280x1024/60Hz, 1280x720/60Hz, 1024x768/60Hz.

HDMI Output

1920x1080p/60Hz, 1920x1080p/50Hz, 1600x1200/60Hz, 1280x1024/60Hz, 1280x720/60Hz, 1024x768/60Hz.

Live view display

HDMI/VGA: 1/4/6/8/9/16/25.

FTP/Schedule/Event Snapshot

Schedule snapshot is not supported 16-ch snapshot, up to 704*576 resolution.
